sendPaymentText: Select the user you want to send to, a description and the amount you will transfer from your account.
receivePaymentText: Select the user you want to receive from, a description and the amount you will receive to your account.
transactionPayerHint: Choose the user from which the amount will be transferred.
receivePaymentText: Select who received what you provided, describe what you provided, and enter the value.
sendPaymentText: Select who provided what you received, describe what you received, and enter the value.
